entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries over northern sections early this evening. Local amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
